name: Club Clear[demo]
description:
Club Clear Beat the club teachers in bullet hell fights! Debate, act and write!

The demo contains 3 clubs: Debate, Drama and Literature. There are 11 fights. 5 bosses and 6 mini-bosses. The soundtrack has 9 tracks.

Gameplay
  • Bullet hell! You attack and try not to get hit by projectiles.
  • Soft-story! Makes sense and gives you a reason, without bugging you.
  • Mini-bosses and bosses! Before the teacher, fight the student. Clear the club.
  • Choose answers to questions! It'll shape the game.
  • Not a lot! It doesn't require a lot of effort to play, just open, fight, and close when you're done.
  • Don't like dialogue? Press the J key to skip.
Controls:

WASD to walk around. In battles IJKL buttons to shoot. I to front J to left and so on.

Q&A

Q: Can i upload gameplay videos and monetize them?

A: Yes!

Q: Can I translate the game?

A: I am working on it, but if you get in contact, I might be able to help you.

Q: I love the sountrack, can I have it?

A: If you like the game or the soundtrack, orif you want to support me, please buy the sountrack for just $1! It REALLY helps.

Q: Can I use the musics in a video?

A: You can,  if you either credit me or buy the soundtrack for just $1! Thanks.

Q: I have a club idea that would be really good in this game, can I say it to you?

A: Of course! Thats also why the club-club exists! In the discord, you can design a club and I can take a look at it. If it's a cool idea, I'll make it real.

Q: How long is the game?

A: 35 minutes! Well, around 35 minutes. Everyone has a different pace. But every club takes about 10 or 13 minutes.
